entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gjoa Haven
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:26 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early this morning. Temperature falling to minus 39 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 54 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Friday 27 January 2023
